### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE personalized_learning_paths (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);


CREATE TABLE student_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    preferred_course_id INT,
    preferred_learning_style VARCHAR(255)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE personalized_learning_paths SET completion_status = TRUE WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101
